metadata.synopsis: This is one of the key moments in the hag's region. The player raises Connor from the dead but without Mayrina present cannot control the Zombie that is now Connor. Panicked and afraid, the zombie struggles to call his wife's name before barelling forward - attacking the very person who raised them from the dead,

0.speaker: Connor Vinderblad
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking around - frantice and afraid. Clumsy and jittering movements.NodeContext: Animalistic noises through you're rotting jaw - looking around for your wife afraid and panicked as you struggled to speak, to form words with a jaw that no longer works

1.speaker: Connor Vinderblad
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Centres on the player and charges - enragedNodeContext: ROARING in rage and fear as you attack the player
